alert.note: Alert for Duval; Jim Wells; Live Oak (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 24 at 10:26AM CST by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Duval, northwestern Jim Wells and south central Live Oak Counties through 1100 AM CST... At 1026 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near San Diego, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Diego, Midway, Tecalote, Westdale and Alfred-South La Paloma. This includes US Highway 281 between mile markers 648 and 666. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
